vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Levi living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, first mentioned at Exo.6.23;
son of: Aaron (H0175) and Elisheba (H0472);
brother of: Nadab (H5070), Eleazar (H0499) and Ithamar (H0385)
§ Abihu = "he is (my) father"
a son of Aaron destroyed for sacrificing strange fire to God
vocabInfos._es_Definition: hijo de Aarón; sacerdote; tribu de Leví
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
亞比戶 这个陽性專有名詞 人名在原文的意思是 "他是(我)父親"
亞倫的兒子, 獻凡火給耶和華被毀滅
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
亚比户 这个阳性专有名词 人名在原文的意思是 "他是(我)父亲"
亚伦的儿子, 献凡火给耶和华被毁灭
